original_text: This is the way he made the ten stands. They were all cast in the same molds and were identical in size and shape.
korean_text: 이와 같이 받침 수레 열 개를 만들었는데 그 부어 만든 법과 크기와 양식을 다 동일하게 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: This is the way he made the ten stands.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 열 개의 받침대를 만든 방법입니다.

sentences.original_text: They were all cast in the same molds
and were identical in size and shape.
